geometry.trackshape

Class TriangleHub

  • java.lang.Object
    • scene.SceneElement
      • geometry.Geometry
        • geometry.trackshape.TriangleHub

  • public class TriangleHub
extends Geometry
    Defines the geometry of a triangle hub segment of piece.track. A hub is always triangular and has three female connection points at the corners to allow other track segments to attach. The specific edge size of the hub is variable though, as is the radius of the curves on each side.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TriangleHub

        public TriangleHub(float triangleSize,
                   float radius)
        This constructs a hub section of piece.track. This hub has three female connections at each corner.
        Parameters:
        triangleSize - is the size of the triangle.
        radius - is the radius of the curved sides of the triangle hub.
